Package domain.block

Class ChainConditionBlock

java.lang.Object
domain.block.Block
domain.block.ConditionBlock
domain.block.ChainConditionBlock
Direct Known Subclasses:
NotBlock
public abstract class ChainConditionBlock
extends ConditionBlock
An abstract class of ChainConditionBlocks that extends ConditionBlock and has a next block.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

    • getNextBlock

      protected Block getNextBlock()
      Description copied from class: Block
      Get the block that is connected after this this one. This can be on the right side or below the current one.
      Specified by:
      getNextBlock in class Block
      Returns:
